short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items from all your favorite stores to GyftHint list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Only you know what you really want. Why have yourself or your loved ones struggle to get each other great gifts? With GyftHint, gifting the perfect gift is a few clicks away. When we say perfect, we mean it! 
How? It's as easy as1-2-3:
1. Download this extension
2. When you see something you like while you are browsing, add it to your GyftHint store by clicking on the Add to GyftHint button that shows on the product page or the gold package icon in your pinned extensions list on your toolbar
3.  Invite your loved ones to join GyftHint with you and you can buy each other gifts right from GyftHint.
 
 No more searching through online stores or driving to malls to fight the crowds while not knowing what to get a loved one...
 No more faking excitement when you receive the wrong gift...
 No more re-entering payment and shipping information on each retailerâ€™s site at checkout - with GyftHint, you enter it only once, and buy the perfect gift every time, with only a couple clicks!

Download GyftHint now and enjoy gifting the way it should be..stress free and fun!.
